rows.author: Cornelius Wambi Gulere
rows.title: A Very Tall Man

math_themes_words.eng: This story looks at counting to 5, descriptions, and comparisons. Practice describing words: too, very, short, tall, long, low, high, big, small; color names; and comparison words: shorter, taller, longer, lower, higher, bigger, smaller

rows.math_themes_words: This story looks at counting to 5, descriptions, and comparisons. Practice describing words: too, very, short, tall, long, low, high, big, small; color names; and comparison words: shorter, taller, longer, lower, higher, bigger, smaller

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.title: Akadeli's Lucky Day

math_themes_words.eng: This story has  counting to 12, colors, and shapes. Practice words: one, two, to twelve, estimate, take away, color names, shortest, tallest, similar, and different.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has  counting to 12, colors, and shapes. Practice words: one, two, to twelve, estimate, take away, color names, shortest, tallest, similar, and different.

rows.author: Bubaali Primary School
rows.title: Can We Count Our Cats

math_themes_words.eng: This story looks at counting from 0 to 9, colors, and color patterns. Practice counting words, color words, words like: too many, biggest number, smallest number, one more, and one less.

rows.math_themes_words: This story looks at counting from 0 to 9, colors, and color patterns. Practice counting words, color words, words like: too many, biggest number, smallest number, one more, and one less.

rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.title: Cat and Dog and the Ball

title.eng: Cat and Dog and the Ball

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to 6, colors, and descriptions. Practice counting words, color names, and words: high, too, similar, different, smallest, biggest, short, tall, biggest, smallest, fewer, and more.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to 6, colors, and descriptions. Practice counting words, color names, and words: high, too, similar, different, smallest, biggest, short, tall, biggest, smallest, fewer, and more.

rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.title: Cat and Dog and the Butterfly

title.eng: Cat and Dog and the Butterfly

math_themes_words.eng: This story has speed descriptions, colors, and counting to 6. Practice counting words, color words, and these words: very, too, fast, slow, faster, slower, fastest, slowest, most, and least.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has speed descriptions, colors, and counting to 6. Practice counting words, color words, and these words: very, too, fast, slow, faster, slower, fastest, slowest, most, and least.

rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.title: Cat and Dog and the Egg

title.eng: Cat and Dog and the Egg

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to 5, comparing, colors, and shapes. Practice words: round, above, below, similar, round, kite, different, bigger, and longer.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to 5, comparing, colors, and shapes. Practice words: round, above, below, similar, round, kite, different, bigger, and longer.

rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.title: Cat and Dog: Dog Is Cold

title.eng: Cat and Dog: Dog Is Cold

math_themes_words.eng: This story talks about extremes of describing words, and counting to 6 with one more or one less. Words to practice are: too, cold, warm, hot, light, dark, day, night, clean, dirty, small, big, short, long, wet, dry, thin, thick, low, high, new, and old.

rows.math_themes_words: This story talks about extremes of describing words, and counting to 6 with one more or one less. Words to practice are: too, cold, warm, hot, light, dark, day, night, clean, dirty, small, big, short, long, wet, dry, thin, thick, low, high, new, and old.

rows.author: Ursula Nafula
rows.title: Clever Cat

math_themes_words.eng: This story has geometry ideas and colors. Practice words: square, rectangle, circle, concentric, open, closed, least, little, small, big, and color names.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has geometry ideas and colors. Practice words: square, rectangle, circle, concentric, open, closed, least, little, small, big, and color names.

rows.author: Caren Echesa
rows.title: Colors of a Rainbow

math_themes_words.eng: This story talks about the numbers to seven, the ordinals to seventh, and colors. Practice the words: one, two, three, to seven; the ordinals first, second, third, to seventh; and the many names of colors.

rows.math_themes_words: This story talks about the numbers to seven, the ordinals to seventh, and colors. Practice the words: one, two, three, to seven; the ordinals first, second, third, to seventh; and the many names of colors.

rows.author: Mlungisi Madlala
rows.title: Creature With Two

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to seven and shapes. Practice words: small numbers, especially one and two; and comparing words such as more, equal, same, and less. Also, talk about squares, circles, solids, stripes, bigger, and smaller.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to seven and shapes. Practice words: small numbers, especially one and two; and comparing words such as more, equal, same, and less. Also, talk about squares, circles, solids, stripes, bigger, and smaller.

rows.author: Samantha Cutler
rows.title: A Dancers Tale

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to 12, comparing, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 12, smallest, shortest, longest, more, less, circle, arc, triangle, rectangle, right angle, straight lines, diagonal, shapes made with lines, Y shape.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to 12, comparing, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 12, smallest, shortest, longest, more, less, circle, arc, triangle, rectangle, right angle, straight lines, diagonal, shapes made with lines, Y shape.

rows.author: Liesl Jobson
rows.title: A Fish and a Gift

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to 8, descriptions and comparisons, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 8, earlier, later, dark, faster, down, backwards, longest, more, little, different, triangle, rectangle, line, side, striaght, horizon, and horizontal.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to 8, descriptions and comparisons, and shapes. Practice words: numbers to 8, earlier, later, dark, faster, down, backwards, longest, more, little, different, triangle, rectangle, line, side, striaght, horizon, and horizontal.

rows.author: Nozizwe Herero
rows.title: Amazing Daisy

math_themes_words.eng: This story has geometry and shape ideas. Practice words: circle, rectangle, sides, corner, vertical line, horizontal line, big, small, low, and high

rows.math_themes_words: This story has geometry and shape ideas. Practice words: circle, rectangle, sides, corner, vertical line, horizontal line, big, small, low, and high

rows.author: Elke and René Leisink
rows.title: Cat and Dog Draw and Color

title.eng: Cat and Dog Draw and Color

math_themes_words.eng: This story has shapes, comparisons, and skip counting.  Practice words: rectangle, square, oval, circle, arc, triangle, line, straight, curved, mirror symmetry, similar, different, less, same, more, pair, difference, right, left, skip counting by 2's, 3's, and 5's.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has shapes, comparisons, and skip counting.  Practice words: rectangle, square, oval, circle, arc, triangle, line, straight, curved, mirror symmetry, similar, different, less, same, more, pair, difference, right, left, skip counting by 2's, 3's, and 5's.

rows.author: Fred Strydom
rows.title: Is There Anyone Like Me?

math_themes_words.eng: This story has counting to 8 and comparing. Practice words: one more, one less, take away, fact family, symmetry, mirror symmetry, similarity, difference, and same.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has counting to 8 and comparing. Practice words: one more, one less, take away, fact family, symmetry, mirror symmetry, similarity, difference, and same.

rows.author: Noni
rows.title: Listen to My Body

math_themes_words.eng: This story has  counting to 10 and comparing. Practice words: more, less, difference, and counting by 2's.

rows.math_themes_words: This story has  counting to 10 and comparing. Practice words: more, less, difference, and counting by 2's.
